mapper.select: /* FreePassInfoMapper.xml, searchFreePassDrmInfo,정액제 상품 DRM 정보 조회 , 김형식/SK플래닛, 2014-03-03 */ SELECT IV.* FROM ( SELECT PD.PROD_ID , DC.PROD_NM AS cmpxProdNm , PM.PART_PROD_ID AS episodeProdId ,(CASE WHEN CM.CMPX_PROD_CLSF_CD NOT IN ('OR004305') THEN ( SELECT NVL( (CASE WHEN C.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD ='PD00310' THEN A.DWLD_DRM_YN WHEN C.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD !='PD00310' THEN A.STRM_DRM_YN END),'N') AS DRM_YN FROM TB_DP_FIXRATE_PROD_MAPG A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B ,TB_DP_PROD C WHERE A.PART_PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.PART_PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND B.PART_PROD_ID = PM.PART_PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = PD.PROD_ID ) ELSE PD.DRM_YN END) AS DRM_YN , (SELECT (CASE WHEN C.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD ='PD00310' THEN A.DWLD_DRM_USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD WHEN C.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD !='PD00310' THEN A.STRM_DRM_USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD END) AS USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD FROM TB_DP_FIXRATE_PROD_MAPG A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B ,TB_DP_PROD C WHERE A.PART_PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.PART_PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND B.PART_PROD_ID = PM.PART_PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = PD.PROD_ID ) AS USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD , (SELECT NVL( (CASE WHEN C.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD ='PD00310' THEN A.DWLD_DRM_USE_PERIOD WHEN C.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD !='PD00310' THEN A.STRM_DRM_USE_PERIOD END),0) AS USE_PERIOD FROM TB_DP_FIXRATE_PROD_MAPG A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B ,TB_DP_PROD C WHERE A.PART_PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.PART_PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND B.PART_PROD_ID = PM.PART_PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = PD.PROD_ID ) AS USE_PERIOD , CM.CMPX_PROD_CLSF_CD , PD.TOP_MENU_ID , TP.PROD_STATUS_CD FROM TB_DP_PROD PD , TB_DP_CMPX_PROD CM , TB_DP_PROD_DESC DC , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE PR ,(SELECT A.PROD_ID ,B.PART_PROD_ID ,A.DWLD_DRM_USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD ,A.DWLD_DRM_USE_PERIOD ,A.STRM_DRM_USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD ,A.STRM_DRM_USE_PERIOD FROM TB_DP_FIXRATE_PROD_MAPG A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B WHERE A.PART_PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD ='DP010802' AND B.PART_PROD_ID=#{episodeProdId} )PM WHERE PD.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND PD.PROD_ID = CM.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = DC.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PM.PROD_ID AND DC.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TP.TENANT_ID = PR.TENANT_ID AND SYSDATE BETWEEN PR.APPLY_START_DT AND PR.APPLY_END_DT ) IV

/* FreePassInfoMapper.xml, searchFreePassDrmInfoV2,정액제 상품 DRM 정보 조회(V2) , 김형식/SK플래닛, 2014-03-03 */ SELECT IV.* FROM ( SELECT PD.PROD_ID , DC.PROD_NM AS cmpxProdNm , PM.EPISODE_PROD_ID AS episodeProdId , PM.DWLD_DRM_YN , PM.STRM_DRM_YN , PM.DWLD_DRM_USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD , PM.DWLD_DRM_USE_PERIOD , PM.STRM_DRM_USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD , PM.STRM_DRM_USE_PERIOD , CM.CMPX_PROD_CLSF_CD , PD.TOP_MENU_ID , TP.PROD_STATUS_CD FROM TB_DP_PROD PD , TB_DP_CMPX_PROD CM , TB_DP_PROD_DESC DC , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE PR ,(SELECT A.* ,B.PART_PROD_ID AS EPISODE_PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_FIXRATE_PROD_MAPG A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B WHERE A.PART_PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD ='DP010802' AND B.PART_PROD_ID=#{episodeProdId} )PM WHERE PD.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND PD.PROD_ID = CM.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = DC.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PM.PROD_ID AND DC.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TP.TENANT_ID = PR.TENANT_ID AND SYSDATE BETWEEN PR.APPLY_START_DT AND PR.APPLY_END_DT ) IV

/* FreePassInfoMapper.xml, searchFreepassBasicList,정액권 기본 정보 조회 , 김형식/SK플래닛, 2014-06-09 */ SELECT PD.PROD_ID , DC.PROD_NM , CM.CMPX_PROD_CLSF_CD AS PLAN_TYPE FROM TB_DP_PROD PD , TB_DP_CMPX_PROD CM , TB_DP_PROD_DESC DC , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP WHERE PD.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND PD.PROD_ID = CM.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = DC.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND DC.LANG_CD = #{lang} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}
